oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Photograph of an American girl, Pauline Kay
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: This photograph of an American girl was sent to and associated with Lt. John Barksdale Greer, 117th MG Battn., 31st Div. who was from Loudon, Tennessee. The back of the card reads, "An American girl that insisted on one more splendid dance even tho she had to come all the way to France unchaperoned-May your French Xmas be extremely happy but all your others be wholly American-Yuge (sic) love for Xmas morning." The photograph is associated with a letter from the same girl [GWmary076].
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Kay, Pauline
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:instructionalMethod: 1.38; 5.47; US.42; Flappers; The 1920s; The Great Gatsby
